AAON is dedicated to corporate social
responsibility through our ɸAAON
Servesɸinitiative. We define quality and build
comfort in the communities in which we operatethrough volunteerism and strategic investments.

nonprofits supported
We support organizations and initiatives that
fosterɸcareer readiness and lifelong learning  for
adult and youth populations, such as the Tulsa
Regional STEM Alliance, Junior Achievement,
Resonance Center for Women, Women in Recovery and
Reading Partners.
 We value ɸstrong families and communities,  and AAON
team members contribute their time and resources by
volunteering at local schools, participating in
mentoring programs and supporting the Tulsa Area
United Way, Big Brothers Big Sisters, The Child Abuse
Network, Family and Children’s Services and many
other organizations.
 
  
 
 
AAON is committed to ɸenvironmental stewardship ɸand
ensuring future quality of life. We have an active
internal ɸgoGreen ɸsustainability committee, and we are
a proud participant in the Sustainable Tulsa
Scor3card sustainability benchmarking initiative. We
are continuously improving our environmental and
social impact.
